description:
A no-compromise mid-height shoe built for the mountain. Drom packs all the performance features you need and will take you where you want to go. Perfectly at home walking to your local crag or high in the mountains, Drom is like a 4x4 for your feet.

***Please Note: Sizing is in UK (See Size Chart for Reference)
name: Boreal (Spain) Drom Mid - Mens
